p: The EL:WM 50:50 wt/wt mix was ground and processed separately. Extruded linseed had 50.57% ALA (% of total fatty acid methyl esther, FAME) and 20.29% LA while walnut meal had 10.94% ALA and a higher concentration of linoleic acid (LA) (60.79%). The addition of the EL:WM mix led to a 7.81% decrease of the n-6:n-3 ratio in the diet.
